Trade/Device Name(s): BD ProbeTec™ Neisseria gonorrhoeae (GC) Qx Amplified DNA Assay
Regulation Name(s): Neisseria spp. direct serological test reagents
Specimen Type(s): Gynecological specimens in BD SurePath™ Preservative Fluid
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD ProbeTec Neisseria gonorrhoeae (GC) Qx Amplified DNA Assay using SDA technology for qualitative detection of N. gonorrhoeae DNA in swab and urine specimens on BD Viper System
Indications for Use Summary: Direct qualitative detection of Neisseria gonorrhoeae DNA in clinician-collected endocervical and male urethral swabs, patient-collected vaginal swabs, male and female urine specimens, and gynecological specimens in BD SurePath Preservative Fluid to aid in diagnosis of gonococcal urogenital disease in asymptomatic and symptomatic individuals
